verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance;<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> <S%H3313>shine<s%> <S%H3313>forth!<s%>
<S%H5375>Rise<s%> up, O <S%H8199>Judge<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H7725>Render<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
<S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5937>exult<s%>?
They <S%H5042>pour<s%> <S%H5042>forth<s%> [words], they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6277>arrogantly;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> <S%H559>vaunt<s%> themselves.
They <S%H1792>crush<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H6031>afflict<s%> Thy <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>
They <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> And <S%H7523>murder<s%> the <S%H3490>orphans.<s%>
And they have <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> does not <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> does the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H995>pay<s%> <S%H995>heed.<s%>"
<S%H995>Pay<s%> <S%H995>heed,<s%> you <S%H9059>senseless<s%> among the <S%H5971>people;<s%> And <S%H4970>when<s%> will you <S%H7919>understand,<s%> <S%H3684>stupid<s%> <S%H3684>ones<s%>?
He who <S%H5193>planted<s%> the <S%H241>ear,<s%> does He not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? He who <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H5869>eye,<s%> does He not <S%H5027>see<s%>?
He who <S%H3256>chastens<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> will He not <S%H3198>rebuke,<s%> [Even] He who <S%H3925>teaches<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> That they are a [mere] <S%H1892>breath.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou dost <S%H3256>chasten,<s%> O <S%H3050>Lord,<s%> And dost <S%H3925>teach<s%> out of Thy <S%H8451>law;<s%>

That Thou mayest <S%H8252>grant<s%> him <S%H8252>relief<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H9563>adversity,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> is <S%H3738>dug<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5203>abandon<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will He <S%H5800>forsake<s%> His <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
For <S%H4941>judgment<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> be <S%H6664>righteous;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H310>follow<s%> it.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H6965>stand<s%> up for me <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H7489>evildoers<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H3320>take<s%> his <S%H3320>stand<s%> for me <S%H5973>against<s%> those who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%>?
<S%H3884>If<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had not <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help,<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> would <S%H4592>soon<s%> have <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in [the abode of] <S%H1745>silence.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I should <S%H559>say,<s%> "My <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H4131>slipped,<s%>" Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> will <S%H5582>hold<s%> me up.
When my <S%H8312>anxious<s%> <S%H8312>thoughts<s%> <S%H7230>multiply<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me, Thy <S%H8575>consolations<s%> <S%H8173>delight<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Can a <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1942>destruction<s%> be <S%H2266>allied<s%> with Thee, One which <S%H3335>devises<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%> by <S%H2706>decree<s%>?

They <S%H9075>band<s%> themselves <S%H1413>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H9345>innocent<s%> to <S%H1818>death.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H4869>stronghold,<s%> And my <S%H430>God<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>

And He has <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> their <S%H205>wickedness<s%> upon them, And will <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them in their <S%H7451>evil;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them.
